meanings.definition: Given to excess in eating; indulging to excess in anything.
meanings.sent1: The gluttonous squirrel ate all the nuts in one sitting.
meanings.sent2: She was known for her gluttonous appetite, always asking for seconds.
meanings.sent3: The gluttonous cat tried to fit all the treats in its tiny mouth.
meanings.sent4: His gluttonous desire for attention made him the center of every conversation.
meanings.sent5: The gluttonous feast left everyone feeling uncomfortably full.

meanings.sent1: The party was full of gluttonous, devouring all the snacks within minutes.
meanings.sent2: The gluttonous at the table always asked for more food.
meanings.sent3: The gluttonous at the party made sure to try every dish at least twice.
meanings.sent4: The gluttonous in the group always cleaned their plates before anyone else.
meanings.sent5: The gluttonous in the family was known for finishing all the leftovers.
